posts.name: Yishai Levy
posts.cooked: We have a big screen in the workshop that isn’t really used at the moment, and I thought it’d be cool to display new CD topics/relevant posts that come every minute or so. Has anyone done this and willing to share a good method? How should I go on about this? Thanks!

posts.name: RoboLancers 321 | LANCE-A-LOT 427 | FIRST Business Development Manager
posts.cooked: Open CD on the screen, set it to autorefresh on a set interval?
posts.display_username: RoboLancers 321 | LANCE-A-LOT 427 | FIRST Business Development Manager

posts.cooked:
The “Unofficial FIRST Robotics Competition Server” on Discord does something like this with a bot called “Dozer” in their #newsfeed channel. Not sure if we can post discord links on CD , but if you’re not on it, you could find it pretty easily via Google.

I’m not code-oriented but I’m sure that bot is just an implementation of some CD /Discourse feature (like RSS idk) which you may prefer.

posts.name: Yishai Levy
posts.cooked: I’m more interested in the contents, and possibly scrolling a bit in each topic until a new one comes up

reply_to_user.name: RoboLancers 321 | LANCE-A-LOT 427 | FIRST Business Development Manager

posts.name: Yishai Levy
posts.cooked: Do you know if there’s some specific API call or something similar for this?

posts.name: Jared Hasen-Klein
posts.cooked:
You can use the RSS feed and use an off-the-shelf solution (or build your own) to pull recent posts:

CD RSS feed CD Forum Support

Alternatively:

Don’t.

I don’t really know much about this sort of stuff. But:

Discord bot This is the bot’s GitHub: GitHub - FRCDiscord/Dozer: Omnipotent guild management bot for FIRST Discord servers I believe the bot can be added to other discord servers

This is the bot’s GitHub: GitHub - FRCDiscord/Dozer: Omnipotent guild management bot for FIRST Discord servers

I believe the bot can be added to other discord servers

I found these (hopefully) related threads CD RSS feed Is Discourse API Supported? /posts.json API endpoint blocked by Cloudflare (this actually seems like exactly what you’re trying to do)

CD RSS feed

Is Discourse API Supported?

/posts.json API endpoint blocked by Cloudflare (this actually seems like exactly what you’re trying to do)

suggested_topics.title: Limelights gives incorrect pose estimate?
suggested_topics.excerpt: use the set robot orientation in the limelight helpers class. Your gyro has to be correctly seeded when your robot comes up. LimelightHelpers.SetRobotOrientation
